section.title: Modules
section.para: Most of the extensions will be of the form of function libraries. Each module is an independent, consistent piece of the whole project, addressing a particular issue or feature area.

primary.title: HTTP Client
primary.para: This module defines a set of functions to send HTTP requests and handle responses. This is a quite low-level functionality, allowing one to deal with most aspects of the HTTP protocol, while integrating smoothly within the XPath Data Model. See the module page for details.

primary.title: ZIP
primary.para: This module has not been released yet, but will provide a set of functions to read the structure of a ZIP file, read entries out of a ZIP file, update entries in an existing ZIP file or create brand-new files. So it will provide the ability to deal with Microsoft's Open XML, OASIS's OpenDocument, and other ZIP-and-XML-based document formats. Stay tuned on the mailing list.
